title: Average spending on Christmas gifts in the U.S .
yAxis: Average estimated amount in U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic shows the Average of Christmas U.S ( LoL ) monthly active amount worldwide from 2006 to 2011 .
In 2011 , LoL had 712 million Christmas U.S , up from 909 million in 2007 .
Being one of the most prominent eSports games , in 2007 LoL championship finals attracted 36 million viewers worldwide .
